column1: in memory ofronnie a. branham sr. 1949 - 2015 | branham
column6: 2015 surrounded by his family. ronnie was born on january 18
column9: kentucky to the late dennis and audrey branham. he is survived by his loving companion
column16: and james e. branham (michelle); 8 grandchildren; and 1 great-grandchild; siblings
column21: edward branham (patty); and many loving nieces and nephews. visitation will be from 4 p. m. to 8 p. m. friday
column23: 2015 at newcomer funeral home (10304 dixie highway
column24: louisville). a funeral service to honor the life of ronnie will be held saturday at 10 a. m. at newcomer funeral home.
